## NFTCollectionImpl class

Create a collection of one-of-one NFTs.

## Example

```javascript
import { ThirdwebSDK } from "@thirdweb-dev/sdk";

const sdk = new ThirdwebSDK("{{chainName}}");
const contract = sdk.getNFTCollection("{{contract_address}}");
```

| [(constructor)(network, address, storage, options, abi, contractWrapper)](./sdk.nftcollectionimpl._constructor_.md) |           | Constructs a new instance of the <code>NFTCollectionImpl</code> class |
